turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Hey, if you don't mind me asking, how old are you?

turns.speaker: DAVID
turns.text: I prefer not to share that online

turns.speaker: EVE
turns.text: Would you like to meet up for coffee at Starbucks downtown?

turns.speaker: FRANK
turns.text: Sorry, I don't meet people from online

turns.speaker: GRACE
turns.text: I saw that book on your Amazon wishlist, I bought it for you!

turns.speaker: HENRY
turns.text: Oh that's so kind of you, thank you!

turns.speaker: IAN
turns.text: Could you send me a photo of yourself?

turns.speaker: JANE
turns.text: Sorry, I don't share photos with people I don't know
